title: Login Failure
description: User cannot log in under certain network conditions

title: Memory Leak
description: Memory usage increases continuously during long-running sessions

title: Data Sync Delay
description: Sync operations take longer than expected on low bandwidth networks

title: Button Misalignment
description: Main CTA button misaligned on small screen devices

title: Database Timeout
description: Database request latency exceeds timeout during traffic spikes

title: API Rate Limit
description: Requests are being throttled due to incorrect rate configuration

title: Missing Notifications
description: Push notifications not delivered to some iOS users

title: Form Submission Error
description: Form validation fails when optional fields are provided

title: Search Index Stale
description: Search engine index is not updating after data inserts

title: UI Theme Mismatch
description: Some controls do not apply dark mode colors correctly
